original_text: The Philistine army went to attack Judah. They made their camp near Lehi and they prepared to fight.
korean_text: 이에 블레셋 사람들이 올라와 유다에 진을 치고 레히에 가득한지라

sentences.original_text: The Philistine army went to attack Judah
sentences.korean_translation: 블레셋 군대는 유다를 공격하기 위해 갔다

sentences.original_text: They made their camp near Lehi
